name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Legalese to English - Privacy Policy & ToS Simplifier

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simplifies Privacy Policies and Terms of Service using AI

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of wading through endless pages of complex legal language? Let Legalese To English be your guide through the murky waters of Terms of Service and Privacy Policies!


What It Does:

Simplifies complex legal documents into easy-to-understand summaries
Works on any Terms of Service or Privacy Policy page
Highlights key points and potential red flags in user-friendly language
Saves you time and helps you make informed decisions about the services you use

How It Works:

Use your Anthropic AI key to configure the app
Navigate to any Terms of Service or Privacy Policy page
Click the Legalese To English extension icon
Get a concise, clear summary of the document's main points
Quickly identify any concerning clauses or important information

Important Disclaimer:
Legalese To English is a tool for convenience and general understanding. It is not a substitute for professional legal advice.

We are not lawyers and do not claim to provide legal services
The summaries and highlights are AI-generated interpretations and may not capture all nuances of the original text
Always read the full document if you have concerns or questions
Use this extension at your own risk â€“ we are not responsible for any consequences resulting from its use or misuse

Make smarter decisions about your online activities without getting lost in legal jargon. Try Legalese To English today and take control of your digital rights!
